channel.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
channel.description:
So, I'm debating with my server co-owner if we should keep the Grand Exchange or not.
He says we should remove it because it apparently helped to kill the Runescape community and is a bad idea for a server which is going to be community based.
I say we should keep it because of from what I've seen, a GE is almost an expected feature in a 508, people see a server much featureless without the GE and will most likely take a little less interest in it.
Any opinions?

item.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
item.dc:creator: @TimeRS3 TimeRS3
item.description:
@TimeRS3 wrote:

hmm this is a tough one XD

really only matters on how you price everything how well your shops are and how fast a player will make money takes a long time to manage that along with ge

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Also, dude don’t ever take criticism about your server from developers. Take it from the players who play servers 24/7 and don’t even care how the servers are being ran on. Developers do not know what the players want, or what really brings a ton of players. Developers just want to flaunt their work. Do what most of your players like. Ask your players, or even ask other owners of big servers.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:13, topic:458182”][quote author=MacaYork link=topic=561106.msg4094378#msg4094378 date=1346701755]
players won’t stay long if the eco is ‘fucked’
[/quote]yeah they will. the power-hungry kids will stay forever[/quote]

Thhhhhhhiiiiiiiisssssssssssssssssssss. The majority of the RSPS players out there require power or else they’re GONE.

OP keep it, it’s just another feature to add onto the list.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:15, topic:458182”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=561106.msg4094533#msg4094533 date=1346709058]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=561106.msg4094532#msg4094532 date=1346708887]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=561106.msg4094405#msg4094405 date=1346702970]
Who said a GE wrecked the economy? That’s not true. The GE changed the economy, didn’t kill it. Helping people buy and sell items helps balance the economy.
[/quote]I said GE wrecked the economy. I remember the economy being so great during free trade, when the grand exchange came it started going way down hill (which also had a lot to do with inflation of goods due to PvP “random drops”). All in my opinion of course
[/quote]I guess it depends on what you mean then Trading and such was more fun back then, but it actually helped the economy itself when the GE came in.

For example, before the GE came in members would scam f2pers by selling laws and such for like 1k each when they were much cheaper in member worlds, the GE stops that sort of thing from happening
[/quote]It also stops from making great profits like that, I like laissez fair a lot more than the Grand Exchange. For instance I remember buying a magic tree seed in 2006 for 3k. I resold it for 300k, now stuff like that does not happen anymore.[/quote]Yes, that does not happen as much anymore. Like you said it’s purely a matter of opinion. I personally think that sort of thing is a sign of a bad economy, whereas you find it to be a good thing. I think that it encourages scamming (or taking advantage of) the uneducated, which I don’t really support. Both have pro’s and cons of course.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:12, topic:458182”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=561106.msg4094532#msg4094532 date=1346708887]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=561106.msg4094405#msg4094405 date=1346702970]
Who said a GE wrecked the economy? That’s not true. The GE changed the economy, didn’t kill it. Helping people buy and sell items helps balance the economy.
[/quote]I said GE wrecked the economy. I remember the economy being so great during free trade, when the grand exchange came it started going way down hill (which also had a lot to do with inflation of goods due to PvP “random drops”). All in my opinion of course
[/quote]I guess it depends on what you mean then Trading and such was more fun back then, but it actually helped the economy itself when the GE came in.

For example, before the GE came in members would scam f2pers by selling laws and such for like 1k each when they were much cheaper in member worlds, the GE stops that sort of thing from happening[/quote]It also stops from making great profits like that, I like laissez fair a lot more than the Grand Exchange. For instance I remember buying a magic tree seed in 2006 for 3k. I resold it for 300k, now stuff like that does not happen anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

An idea I’ve had:

I don’t use 508+'s so GE isn’t an option, but instead of pressing sell and waiting for it to find somebody buying, why not have an interface where you can view every item that is buying bought/sold, if you have an item that someone if looking to buy, you can press a button and sell it to him for the price he has listed. Vise versa for selling.

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Grand Exchange, keep or disable?
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

If you were to keep it you have to be dedicated to change the prices to agree with the economy so it does not fuck up
If your just going to set the prices for an item on the grand exchange and expect to not change them, then yes your economy will be ruined. It will be a lot of work if you choose to keep it. Anyways it’s probally not even your GE, probally came with what you downloaded lol

Read full topic
